title: Bug 103963 - No friendly error message when no data for series
description: When there is no data for a series, there should be a friendly error message displayed to remind the user.
OB: On Preview, no friendly error message is displayed when there is no data for a series.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Preview. 
2. Check if there is any series with no data. 
3. Confirm if a friendly error message is displayed or not when there is no data for a series.
